com.google.ase.terminal
Class TermKeyListener

java.lang.Object
  com.google.ase.terminal.TermKeyListener

 class TermKeyListener
extends java.lang.Object

An ASCII key listener. Supports control characters and escape. Keeps track of the current state of the alt, shift, and control keys.

keyDown

public int keyDown(int keyCode,
                   KeyEvent event)
Handle a keyDown event.

Parameters:
keyCode - the keycode of the keyDown event
Returns:
the ASCII byte to transmit to the pty, or -1 if this event does not produce an ASCII byte.
